level.heading: Long-Term Care Ombudsman; appointment; vacancy - Training and experience.

level.text: The ombudsman shall have training and experience in the following areas:
Gerontology, long-term care, health care, or relevant social services program;
Dispute resolution techniques, including investigation, mediation, or negotiation; and
No person who has been employed by a long-term care facility or a corporation that directly or indirectly owned or operated a long-term care facility within the past 2 years shall be an ombudsman.
Neither the ombudsman nor any member of his or her immediate family shall have any pecuniary interest in a long-term care facility.
